summary: wifi: nl80211: hold wdev mutex for tid config
details:
wifi: nl80211: hold wdev mutex for tid config

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 05330210d27994a5e2f64f01f621acb0623273aa, it was introduced in version v5.19.2 by commit 7a53ad13c09150076b7ddde96c2dfc5622c90b45. For more details please see the references link.
